text: Aladino was an Italian Eurodance act that formed in 1993 by producers Giacomo Maiolini, Diego Abaribi, Andrea Savini, DJ Silvio Perrone, Giordano Trivellato, Stefano Brignoli, Andrea Bruciato, Luigi "Mr. Cheng" Lacerenza, Giuliano Sacchetto, Mauro Marcolin, & Valerio Gaffurini. The Project featured the vocalists of Emanuela Gubinelli, Sandy Chambers & Sagi Rei. ==Singles== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2"| Single ! colspan="1"| Peak chart positions ! rowspan="2"| Album |- ! width="30"| EUR |- | rowspan="2"| 1993 | align="left"| "Make It Right Now" | — | align="left" rowspan="5"| non-album single |- | align="left"| "Brothers In The Space" | 82 |- | 1994 | align="left"| "Call My Name" | — |- | 1995 | align="left"| "Stay With Me" | — |- | 2002 | align="left"| "Feel The Fire" | — |- | colspan="15" style="font-size:8pt"| "—" denotes items which were not released in that country or failed to chart. |} ==References== Category:Italian Eurodance groups
